verses.verse: Thus all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> that Solomon <S%H8010><s%> performed <S%H6213><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was finished. <S%H9608><s%> And Solomon <S%H8010><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> in the things that David <S%H1732><s%> his father had dedicated, <S%H1><s%> even the silver <S%H6944><s%> and the gold <S%H3701><s%> and all <S%H2091><s%> the utensils, <S%H3605><s%> [and] put <S%H3627><s%> [them] in the treasuries <S%H5414><s%> of the house <S%H214><s%> of God. <S%H1004><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the tribes, <S%H4294><s%> the leaders <S%H5387><s%> of the fathers' [households] of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to bring <S%H5927><s%> up the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> themselves to the king <S%H4428><s%> at the feast, <S%H2282><s%> that is [in] the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>
Then all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> took <S%H5375><s%> up the ark. <S%H727><s%>

And they brought <S%H5927><s%> up the ark <S%H727><s%> and the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> utensils <S%H3627><s%> which <S%H834><s%> [were] in the tent; <S%H168><s%> the Levitical <S%H3881><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> brought <S%H5927><s%> them up.

And King <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who were assembled <S%H3259><s%> with him before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> were sacrificing <S%H2076><s%> so many <S%H7230><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> and oxen, <S%H1241><s%> that they could not be counted <S%H5608><s%> or numbered. <S%H4487><s%>

Then the priests <S%H3548><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to its place, <S%H4725><s%> into the inner <S%H1687><s%> sanctuary <S%H1687><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> to the holy <S%H6944><s%> of holies, <S%H6944><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the cherubim. <S%H3742><s%>

For the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> spread <S%H6566><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of the ark, <S%H727><s%> so that the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> made <S%H3680><s%> a covering <S%H3680><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> and its poles. <S%H905><s%>

And the poles <S%H905><s%> were so long <S%H748><s%> that the ends <S%H7218><s%> of the poles <S%H905><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%> could be seen <S%H7200><s%> in front <S%H6440><s%> of the inner <S%H1687><s%> sanctuary, <S%H1687><s%> but they could not be seen <S%H7200><s%> outside; <S%H2351><s%> and they are there <S%H8033><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

There <S%H369><s%> was nothing <S%H369><s%> in the ark <S%H727><s%> except <S%H7534><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> [there] at Horeb, <S%H2722><s%> where <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when they came <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And when the priests <S%H3548><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> from the holy <S%H6944><s%> place (for all <S%H3605><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> who were present <S%H4672><s%> had sanctified <S%H6942><s%> themselves, without <S%H369><s%> regard <S%H8104><s%> to divisions <S%H4256><s%>),

and all <S%H3605><s%> the Levitical <S%H3881><s%> singers, <S%H7891><s%> Asaph, <S%H623><s%> Heman, <S%H1968><s%> Jeduthun, <S%H3038><s%> and their sons <S%H1121><s%> and kinsmen, <S%H251><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in fine <S%H948><s%> linen, <S%H948><s%> with cymbals, <S%H4700><s%> harps, <S%H5035><s%> and lyres, <S%H3658><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> east <S%H4217><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and with them one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> blowing <S%H2690><s%> trumpets <S%H2689><s%>

in unison <S%H259><s%> when the trumpeters <S%H2689><s%> and the singers <S%H7891><s%> were to make <S%H8085><s%> themselves heard <S%H8085><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%> to praise <S%H1984><s%> and to glorify <S%H3034><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and when they lifted <S%H7311><s%> up their voice <S%H6963><s%> accompanied by trumpets <S%H2689><s%> and cymbals <S%H4700><s%> and instruments <S%H3627><s%> of music, <S%H7892><s%> and when they praised <S%H1984><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> [saying, "][He] indeed <S%H3588><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> for His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting, <S%H5769><s%>" then the house, <S%H1004><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with a cloud, <S%H6051><s%>

so that the priests <S%H3548><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not stand <S%H5975><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> for the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>
